programme.title: Churchill's Soviet warning and the Chinese threat
programme.short_synopsis: Winston Churchill's predictions and the threat of communist China.
programme.medium_synopsis: Fifty years after Churchill's speech warning of Soviet ambitions in Europe, Alistair Cooke considers the new threat posed by communist China.
